definition: painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
to build up an enterprise through painstaking efforts
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
Heaven will not disappoint the person who tries (idiom). If you try hard, you're bound to succeed eventually.
pinyin: Huang2 tian1 bu4 fu4 ku3 xin1 ren2

sentences.english: He did not stop her, because he understood her love towards him.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有制止她，因爲他知道她的一片苦心。

sentences.english: Google developers are hammering away at the problem.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌開發者正在苦心研究這些問題。

sentences.english: I fully understand this situation thinking about this.
sentences.chinese: 想到這裏我就理解大人們的一片苦心了。

sentences.english: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking efforts.
sentences.chinese: 爲了改造環境，他苦心孤詣地制定了這個計劃。

sentences.english: She took great pains in educating her children.
sentences.chinese: 她煞費苦心教育她的子女。

sentences.english: Said is at pains to make a distinction, therefore, between truth and value.
sentences.chinese: 賽義德爲區分真理和價值，這兩個概念煞費苦心。

sentences.english: At the end, he ground out the enormous "Biography of George Washington".
sentences.chinese: 最後，他苦心經營總算寫成卷帙浩繁的《華盛頓傳》。

sentences.english: Copying the ancients, ink pen with him to learn, to understand the idea of his pains.
sentences.chinese: 臨摹古人，要學他用筆用墨，懂得他苦心構思。

sentences.english: So you see , my dear , you ' ve abased yourself to no purpose.
sentences.chinese: 你看，親愛的，你白費一番苦心貶低自己了。

sentences.english: In America, suburban homes have bigger and spookier lawn displays each year.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，郊區住家每年都會在裝飾草坪上大費苦心。

sentences.english: Innovation must be painstakingly nurtured and generously funded.
sentences.chinese: 創新須苦心培養，慷慨資助。

sentences.english: Translating an obscure piece of writing is even more painstaking than writing it directly.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯一篇晦澀的作品要比直接寫一篇更費苦心。

sentences.english: Laboriously did he describe the genesis of the picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他熬費苦心地描繪了這次野餐的根由。

sentences.english: However, the civilians' common knowledge is not conceived by the deliberately-pretended low key.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，老百姓的常識沒有被這種苦心孤詣的低調忽悠。

to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth

heart's blood/expenditure (for some project)/meticulous care

to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out

to rack one's brains (idiom); to take great pains to think sth through
to plot actively (idiom)/scheming/calculating
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to put one's heart (and soul) into sth/with great care
mental and physical efforts
to concentrate fully on sth/single-minded
